ygData.subject: Re: Combining evolution with evolution (request for references)
ygData.msgSnippet: I rushed through your paper just now, so I can be wrong on this. Neat already has similar implementation: The organism with the highest fitness in a species

I rushed through your paper just now, so I can be wrong on this.

Neat alre=
ady has similar implementation:
The organism with the highest fitness in a =
species will only have
their weights mutated. Another words, topologically =
change only
happens in lower fitness organisms anyway.
There are many other=
 ways to configurate this too. For example, you
can add another action for =
the organism with the highest fitness, so
it can sometimes disable genes or=
 go into pruning process (phase search).
Conceptually, these all work in th=
e same way as your suggested
algorithms in that dramatic mutation should be=
 applied sparingly and
accordingly.

Feel free to correct me.
